sentence: Our room overlooked the pool and the walls not so sound proof as we attempted to get some sleep
We could not take our toddler to the pool because the pool and ourside area was filthy
The pool closed at 8 oclock and neither of the rooms offered a microwave
They gave us an extra 20 minutes past dusk to swim

Bed was very smelly furniture was stripping couch was stained and pillows was also smelly had to buy new pillows and ask for sheet change hotel was n’t comfy at alpol was dirty nothing like the pictures online will not be returning Everything was horrible failed advertising online wanted to swim pool was dirty
There is coffee available all day and a pool table
The pool was DISGUSTING which was heartbreaking as watching the kids play in the pool is a highlight
could not get into exterior doors even with my key around pool Elevator panel around the bottom was missing looks poorly kept

My pics will not uploadOur family had 3 different rooms and we all experienced what had been mentioned in the reviews scratches on the walls inside the room and hallways scratches on headboard dirty shower put a towel in the shower nasty water and grime stained tile stained and worn carpet lack of pleasantry from hotel staff when I checked in 3 were looking at a stack of headshot photographs I had to ask about elevators and breakfast the pool was pretty sad 1 elevator was missing the close door button
I recommend buying some umbrellas there is no shad to cool off when you are swimming which is a little ridiculous especially when you have a kid with you
The room was great the bar was great the pool was great
My grandchildren loved the pool ping pong table and bean bag toss

One of the newest and cleanest hotels in the area very friendly service custom breakfast a fully stocked Bar and outside pool rooms are large and modern coffee and safe in rooms local shopping area and movie theater walking distance from Hotel
They have everything you could want affordable rates extremely clean a pool workout room breakfast and a bar
They had a bar ping pong table and pool table
The pool was colorful and beautiful outdoor pool
Ants everywhere around the pool and back walkway parking lot
And while the “ fun ” and “ funkines ” of the Aloft lobby yes there is a bar and game tables and pool area is unique I was sorely disappointed in the basic care and amenities

Our stay was short but the property was beautiful the rooms were beautiful the lobby was set up a pool table ping pong and other activities for you to do and the young man at the front desk who checked us in was wonderful and was still the when were getting ready to leave
